CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

totalCost.description: Current total cost, based on the information known by the CSMS, of the transaction including taxes. In the currency configured with the configuration Variable: [<<configkey-currency, Currency>>]

transactionId.description: Transaction Id of the transaction the current cost are asked for.
